channel.title: [24/7] Cram-Scape 317
channel.description:
[CENTER] [U][B][SIZE=6]Sup guys, i'm Cram and this is Cram-Scape![/SIZE][/B] [/U] Forum: [url=http://www.cram-scape.forumactif.com]www.cram-scape.forumactif.com[/url] Client Download: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/91111982/Cram-Scape.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/91111982/Cram-Scape.jar[/url] Webclient: [url=http://cram-scape.forumperso.com/h1-webclient]http://cram-scape.forumperso.com/h1-webclient[/url]
[table][tr] [td]● 24/7 Vps Hosting ● 24+ Perfect Skill ● XP Rate System ● Barrows ● Pest Control ● TzHaar Cave ● Duel Arena ● Warrior Guild ● Godwars[/td] [td]● King Black Dragon ● Dagannoth Kings ● Tormented Demon ● Corporal Beast ● Karphite Queen ● Nomad ● Squeal Of Fortune ● Completionist Cape ● Milestone Cape[/td] [td]● Perfect Pking ● Every Dungeoneering Item ● Great Economy ● So much more... [/td] [/tr] [/table] [SIZE=3]Barrow Minigame like runescape, you kill 5 brother and go to the chest for the final kill.[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/6ggbig.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]Chaos Elemental is dropping the whip vine which is used ot make the abyssal vine whip.[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/1tkaz6.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]Corporal Beast drop every spirit shield and chaotic item.[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/33dy23l.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]Custom Dungeoneering, every floor have dungeoneering item (bathus,promethium,primal,...) and monster to kill.[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2qamnhd.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]Frost drag for frost drag bones and korasi.[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/fvhieq.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]Kalphite Queen drop kit to ornate dragon gear.[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2me5zc7.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]Nomad is dropping the new fire cape Tokhaar-Kal.[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/ofx153.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]Some of the rare item![/SIZE] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/27z9bvr.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]Squeal of fortune, you can get almost every rare item![/SIZE] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2w20zkz.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]You can choose your xp rate based on real runescape which give you an awesome title and rare drop boost.[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2coqy4z.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]Pack yak is working![/SIZE] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/29c6vz8.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]Summoning attack is working![/SIZE] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2njj9js.png[/img]
[SIZE=5]There is plenty more monster/boss to drop other rare item, more shops, more of everything! And if you guys think of something really cool, I frequently update so be sure to inform me![/SIZE]
Bonus: A little Pking Video ! :D
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=04v-8s00esk [/CENTER]

item.title: [24/7] Cram-Scape 317

item.description:

[CENTER] [U][B][SIZE=6]Sup guys, i’m Cram and this is Cram-Scape![/SIZE][/B]

[SIZE=3]Barrow Minigame like runescape, you kill 5 brother and go to the chest for the final kill.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Chaos Elemental is dropping the whip vine which is used ot make the abyssal vine whip.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Corporal Beast drop every spirit shield and chaotic item.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Custom Dungeoneering, every floor have dungeoneering item (bathus,promethium,primal,…) and monster to kill.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Frost drag for frost drag bones and korasi.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Kalphite Queen drop kit to ornate dragon gear.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Nomad is dropping the new fire cape Tokhaar-Kal.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Some of the rare item![/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Squeal of fortune, you can get almost every rare item![/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]You can choose your xp rate based on real runescape which give you an awesome title and rare drop boost.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Pack yak is working![/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Summoning attack is working![/SIZE]

[SIZE=5]There is plenty more monster/boss to drop other rare item, more shops, more of everything! And if you guys think of something really cool, I frequently update so be sure to inform me![/SIZE]

Bonus: A little Pking Video !

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=04v-8s00esk
